entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOP @WhiteHouse Don’t forget when COVID-19 1st hit America this president joke about it and demonize the Democracy’s by calling it “a Democrat hoax” for almost a MONTH, until the stock market started to crash in March then that’s when Trump started to take it seriously and acted LATE!
